metadata.name: Daily Meditation over Loch Eck, Scotland. #1/12
metadata.description:
Gratitude for slowing down,  
Observing the inner world,  
Finding a moments peace,  
In the present moment,  
Free from the pressures,  
Of the outer environmentâ€¦ 

Shot on August 31st 2022, just after our daily meditation as a dedication to all those who joined this special session over looking Loch Eck.  
 
Camera : Hasselblad 503CW + CFV ii 50c 
Lens : 50mm CFI  
Exposure : F32 @ 4 minutes
